item.title: About This Site
item.description: “Many musicians … have no awareness of the importance of consciously choosing an edition; which criteria to apply; which criteria may have been applied in editing; why and how to make a good choice."1 “On the other hand many musicians … wanted to know about alternatives, about versions … they wanted to shape their musical text and be responsible for it."2 Musicians therefore need transparent editions that allow them to check the editor’s choices and to see where different choices are possible.
